mapper.select: SELECT id, parent_id AS parentId, name, status, address AS address, owner_name AS ownerName, owner_phone AS ownerPhone, `desc`, lng, lat, thumbnail, video, detail_cover_img AS detailCoverImg, detail_img AS detailImg, video_cover_img AS videoCoverImg, video_list AS videoList, `index`, open_rules AS openRules, city_code AS cityCode FROM WHERE id = #{id}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO ( parent_id, name, city_code, address, owner_name, owner_phone, status, `desc`, lng, lat, thumbnail, detail_cover_img, detail_img, video, `index`, open_rules, create_date, creator, create_ip ) VALUES ( #{parentId}, #{name}, #{cityCode}, #{address}, #{ownerName}, #{ownerPhone}, #{status}, #{desc}, #{lng}, #{lat}, #{thumbnail}, #{detailCoverImg}, #{detailImg}, #{video}, #{index}, #{openRules}, NOW(), #{creator}, #{createIp} )
